# St. Louis Demonstration Junior High School

> Official website for St. Louis Demonstration Junior High School, a premier Catholic educational institution in Kumasi, Ghana, serving students with excellence in academics, character development, and community engagement.

## About the School

**St. Louis Demonstration Junior High School** is located in Suame Mbrom, Kumasi, Ashanti Region, Ghana (P.O. Box 3041, Mbrom-Kumasi, GPS: AK-015-1612). As a Catholic demonstration school, we provide comprehensive junior high school education with a focus on academic excellence, moral development, and community service.

**Contact Information:**
- Phone: +233 20 870 5290
- Alumni Contact: emma@stlouisdemojhs.com
- PTA Contact: michelle@stlouisdemojhs.com
- Social Media: Facebook, WhatsApp, TikTok (@st.louis.demonstr)

## Academic Programs

**Core Curriculum:** We offer the complete Ghana Education Service JHS curriculum including:
- Mathematics - Advanced problem-solving and numerical literacy
- English Language - Communication skills and literature
- Integrated Science - Physics, Chemistry, Biology foundations
- Social Studies - History, Geography, Civic education
- Religious and Moral Education - Character and ethical development
- Ghanaian Language - Local language proficiency
- French - International language skills
- Career Technology - Practical and vocational skills
- Computing/ICT - Digital literacy and technology
- Creative Arts and Design - Artistic expression and creativity
- Music - Musical education and performance

**Special Programs:**
- STEM Education (/stem) - Science, Technology, Engineering, Mathematics focus
- AI Integration - MayaMiles AI learning assistant with Maya (female) and Miles (male) voices
- Character Education - Moral and ethical development programs

## Educational Resources & Tools

**AI-Powered Learning:**
- Louis AI (/louis-ai): Intelligent school assistant providing instant, accurate answers about admissions, academics, school life, and everything about St. Louis Demonstration JHS
- MayaMiles AI Assistant: Personalized learning with Maya (female voice) and Miles (male voice)
- SuperChat Integration: Full-screen iframe access to supermemory.chat for text-based learning
- AI Search (/ai-search): Advanced search functionality across school resources
- AI Tools: Audio, Video, Image, and Text-to-Speech tools for enhanced learning

**Student Resources:**
- Learn Hub (/learnhub): Comprehensive educational materials and learning resources
- JHS Textbooks (/jhs-textbooks): Curriculum-aligned textbooks and materials
- Career Resources (/career-reel-resources): Career guidance and pathway information
- Educational Guides (/educational-guide): Academic and pathway guidance
- Dream Hive Resources (/dream-hive-resources): Inspirational and motivational content
- Money Smart Links (/money-smart-links): Financial literacy resources

**Higher Education Database:** Comprehensive information on post-JHS options including nursing institutions, teacher training, universities, professional institutes, TVET schools, military academies, religious seminaries, art schools, agricultural colleges, business schools, and online universities.
